page.title: 09WAVENEY SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The work on the Waveney Sports Centre started in 1976 and was finished in 1982.The facilities include Swimming, Hockey,Badminton,Basketball,Football, Netball,Tennis,Cricket and Volleyball. There are also Changing Rooms,Toilets, and Showers,plus a communal locker room.There are four squash courts with changing rooms for men and women.The Fitness Room contains...Bar weights, cycle machines and rowing machines.The leisure bar sells an excellent range of Beers,Wines and Spirits.The bar also sells food.The Pye Sauna/Solarium suite has a 12 person sauna cabin and a massage chair.A shower is also provided.
